ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Lag in zones
ygData.msgSnippet: WOW, I seem lag in Rivervale too. Thought it was weird as other places are fine. Be interested to responses. Good Luck ...
ygData.messageBody:
WOW, I seem lag in Rivervale too.
Thought it was weird as other places are fine.

Be interested to responses.

Good Luck
--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> I just added the necessary memory to max out my
> system.
> Unfortunately, that max is 256. I would love to go
> to 512 or more,
> but that would require a new system.
>
> Things have improved with the added memory, but I
> still get lots of
> lag in Rivervale, and similar town type zones. My
> graphics card is an
> Nvidia TNT 64 (don't know what the 64 means, it is
> 32meg). It is the
> best I could find last year for the money I had, and
> more than
> adequate for the game at that time. I needed pci, so
> my choices were
> a bit limited. More than that, my knowledge was much
> less in those
> days.
>
> I am curious as to what kinds of graphics cards
> people use, and
> whether or not they are experiencing lag in zones
> like Rivervale in
> spite of having a pretty good system.
>
> Anyone have a killer rig, and still find lag or
> other problems? I
> just wonder how much is the game, how much my now
> low end system.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
